creditline: Given in memory of Thomas L. Daniels by his famliy and friends
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

On the side of the stand, within an oval, is engraved an unidentified crest.
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on underside of base.  Maker's mark and lion passant on handle, on vinegar bottle, and inside on one of the frames.
title: Cruet set, blind bottle
